text: Zayatulak and HyuhyluФ. Надршина. Об эпическом сказании. (Bashkir: Заятүләк менән Һыуhылыу, Zayatüläk menän Hyuhylyu) is a Bashkir epic, a nation who lives in Republic of Bashkortostan, Russia. It is one of the first Bashkir epics. The main characters are Zayatulak and Hyuhylu. == Summary == At the start of the epic, Zayatulak dives in a lake, where a mermaid named Hyuhylu lives there. The epic is completed with the death of Hyuhylu while she was waiting Zayatulak, while Zayatulak was riding a tulpar. He was needing one more day to reach Hyuhylu. Shortly after Zayatulak commits suicide in the tomb of Hyuhylu. == Geographical places named in the epic == The epic takes place in the following places in Davlekanovsky district, Bashkortostan: * Mount Balkan-Tau (Zayatulaktau) *Lake Kandrykul *Lake Aslikul == See also == * Ural- batyr * Akbuzat == References == Category:Bashkir culture
title: Zayatulak and Hyuhylu
